title: Map editor
body:
What if Riot made a map editor for League?
Allow all of the insanely creative fans of the game to create and play their own adventures and map modes.

replies.body: There used to be a program that would customise summoners rift. It would simply change textures and such by giving it winter themes and such, though the program is no longer supported. The program is no longer supported because it probably tampered with League's local files which Riot isn't a fan of so I doubt they'd allow you to create a map and import it into the game. But who knows :^)
